replies.body: Half of my skins are for champs I played yesterday for the first time in 6 months. Rito please look at my most played champs and give me skins for them...
Either this bot is trash at picking skins or riot is just trolling :(
thats sucks
is it normal to get like 5 skins of champs you barely play.
I've spent $865. {{item:3070}}

With two of the champs I got skins for in the shop I have played maybe 3 games or so in total, and with the others hardly any at all, so am not too pleased about that :P Is the "Your Shop" going to refresh at any point and offer different skins? It would probably be better if skins were offered for the champs that you have the highest mastery with, or something like that. Thank you

the mastery thing is a good idea, but it should take into account skins that you already own, or if for example, you have DJ Sona, it won't give you another skin besides maybe arcade, because it is closest in quality
I'm really hoping the shop gets reset, I'm really hoping to get my hands on the last skins I need for my two most played champs, Vancouver {{champion:32}} and Workshop {{champion:35}}
My shop is currently bugged and the shop isn't loading for me. Not sure if it's just me...
its not just you, i cant even find it whether its the button or in t he store its no where.
The button for me is located next to the free champ rotation button. I can also access it through clicking the article on the main home page of the client. Still no luck though...{{champion:32}}
Hey guys, we're currently investigating the problem.
Thankyou so much, the shop is fixed for me. Got myself my lil devil teemo skin... {{champion:17}}
NICE! I got myself Snow Day Malzahar xD

my shop doesn't load either, i've also been in que for 20 mins for an aram and still nothing, and never received my icons for singularity. the new client is an embarrassment, this game just keeps getting worse and worse and the constant champion reworks are disgusting, destroying peoples champs like that, it's bad enough when they mess with the items. rip force of nature and madreds. rakkan and xayah look like they were made for some 10 year olds japanese game, so lame.

Your shop should be up and running now. Please have another go. Singularity icons should appear in your account by 30/5/17 16:59 PM AEST. 

It's unfortunate that you feel that way about the recent champ reworks, items etc. Hopefully you will find something you can enjoy in future patches.
Well I otp draven and I got soul reaver 50% :D

G'day Riot. I have a complaint about the DiscountBot. I think that the bot should be updated to take into account amount of play time and amount of skins on that champion. I got an udyr skin, but already have spirit guard. I also got prestigious leblanc, but i have played her maybe 3 times? It was the same situation with tf. SKin for him, barely play him, not interested in playing him. i was really hoping for headhunter rengar, a thresh skin, and a graves skin. But i was throuroughly disappointed. This is purely feedback for future Your Shop releases. I believe that the bot could be improved greatly.
yah the shop isnt working lol
yep working now
Yep wont open
